titles.title: A joint resolution to prohibit the unauthorized use of United States Armed Forces in hostilities with respect to Venezuela.
Prohibiting Unauthorized Military Action in Venezuela Resolution of 2019
Prohibiting Unauthorized Military Action in Venezuela Resolution of 2019
Prohibiting Unauthorized Military Action in Venezuela Resolution of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Prohibiting Unauthorized Military Action in Venezuela Resolution of 2019
This joint resolution prohibits department or agency funding from being used to introduce armed forces into hostilities with Venezuela, except pursuant to a specific statutory authorization by Congress enacted after this joint resolution.
